relevant_findings.cardiac_findings: 2/6 holosystolic murmur at the left sternal border without radiation
relevant_findings.abdominal_findings: Diffusely tender on palpation, no distention, rebound, or guarding; liver span normal; spleen not palpable; guaiac-negative stool

relevant_findings.abdominal_imaging: CT and MRI scans showing intimal thickening and enhancement in the abdominal aorta
relevant_findings.temporal_artery_biopsy: Dense inflammatory infiltrates consistent with giant-cell arteritis

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial imaging showed thickening and enhancement, which resolved after glucocorticoid therapy
